Sergei Prokofiev

Sonatina in E minor, op. 54 no. 1

1931–1932

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 10'

  • 1. Allegro moderato
  • 2. Adagietto
  • 3. Allegretto

Prokofiev later used themes from the sonatina in the sonata no. 10 in E minor (op. 137).
